project.name: AssertJ Core
project.description: Rich and fluent assertions for testing in Java

properties.argLine:
-javaagent:${settings.localRepository}/org/mockito/mockito-core/${mockito.version}/mockito-core-${mockito.version}.jar -Dfile.encoding=${project.build.sourceEncoding} -Dnet.bytebuddy.experimental=true
--add-modules junit,net.bytebuddy,org.junit.jupiter.api,org.junit.platform.commons
--add-opens org.assertj.core/org.assertj.core.api=ALL-UNNAMED --add-opens org.assertj.core/org.assertj.core.internal=ALL-UNNAMED --add-opens org.assertj.core/org.assertj.core.testkit=ALL-UNNAMED
--add-opens java.base/java.lang=ALL-UNNAMED --add-opens java.base/java.lang=org.assertj.core --add-opens java.base/java.math=ALL-UNNAMED --add-opens java.base/java.math=org.assertj.core --add-opens java.base/java.util=ALL-UNNAMED --add-opens java.base/java.util=org.assertj.core --add-opens java.base/sun.nio.fs=ALL-UNNAMED
--add-exports org.assertj.core/org.assertj.core.testkit=org.junit.platform.commons --add-exports org.assertj.core/org.assertj.core.testkit.junit.jupiter=org.junit.platform.commons --add-exports org.junit.platform.commons/org.junit.platform.commons.logging=ALL-UNNAMED --add-exports org.junit.platform.commons/org.junit.platform.commons.util=ALL-UNNAMED --add-opens org.assertj.core/org.assertj.core.api=org.junit.platform.commons --add-opens org.assertj.core/org.assertj.core.api.abstract_=org.junit.platform.commons --add-opens org.assertj.core/org.assertj.core.api.assumptions=org.junit.platform.commons --add-opens org.assertj.core/org.assertj.core.api.atomic=org.junit.platform.commons --add-opens org.assertj.core/org.assertj.core.api.atomic.boolean_=org.junit.platform.commons --add-opens org.assertj.core/org.assertj.core.api.atomic.integer=org.junit.platform.commons --add-opens org.assertj.core/org.assertj.core.api.atomic.integerarray=org.junit.platform.commons --add-opens org.assertj.core/org.assertj.core.api.atomic.long_=org.junit.platform.commons --add-opens org.assertj.core/org.assertj.core.api.atomic.longadder=org.junit.platform.commons --add-opens org.assertj.core/org.assertj.core.api.atomic.longarray=org.junit.platform.commons --add-opens configuration.bnd: Import-Package:\ net.bytebuddy.*,\ !org.assertj.core.*,\ *;resolution:="optional" Multi-Release: true -exportcontents: \ !org.assertj.core.internal.*,\ org.assertj.core.* -noclassforname: true -noextraheaders: true -snapshot: SNAPSHOT -removeheaders: Private-Package -fixupmessages: \ "Classes found in the wrong directory...";is:=ignore
